title: 29 - Joyelle Nicole
itunes:title: 29 - Joyelle Nicole
description: Joyelle! What a badass. Not only has she been crushing it performing on Late Night with Seth Meyers, warming up the crowd for Hasan Minhaj’s Patriot Act, and writing for the final season of Broad City, but she’s also been touring around the country doing shows to raise money for independent abortion clinics. We’re talking everything from Will Smith to Disney movies to what a world with only women might look like. Here are five words to describe this episode: don’t blindly follow white women.

We’re talking everything from Will Smith to Disney movies to what a world with only women might look like. Here are five words to describe this episode: don’t blindly follow white women.
itunes:author: All Things Comedy
